item.title: Coffee Tycoon
item.description:
Build your own coffee shop empire! In this simulation game, your job is to manage your coffee´s staff depending on your own goals (to achieve game´s goals) of: making money, increase costumers or increase the number of shops.

As your business grows you can use the money you earn on improvements for your empire, like buying new recipes for your menu, advertising to bring more costumers, new equipment for increased income and many others options.
